#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,i,k,l,m,x,y,j,h;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		y=0;
		scanf("%d%d",&l,&m);
		//cout<<" l= "<<l<<" m= "<<m<<endl;
		for(i=l;i<=m;i++)
		{h=i;
		k=0;
			//cout<<" i= "<<i<<endl;
			x=1;
			while(h!=0)
			{
			k=k+(h%10);
			h=h/10;	
			}
			//cout<<" k= "<<k<<endl;
			for(j=2;j<=k/2;j++)
			{
				if(k%j==0)
				x=0;
			}
			if(k==1)
			x=0;
			if(x==1)
			y++;
			//cout<<" y= "<<y<<endl;
		}
		printf("%d\n",y);
}	
return 0;
}
